title: Yasuo Bot skin splash visual glitch.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Pretty sure the link shows it all. 

If you're not sure what's wrong, take a look at Yasuo Bot. 

Yasuo Bot was using one of the new chroma skins in game.

replies.body: Chromas doesn't have specific splash art. They use the default (or the skin if the chroma is made for a skin ^^)
Then why is this the classic splash art if yasuo chromas are for High Noon?

Chromas use the parent skin splash, and don't have a unique splash art, buuuut since it's High Noon Yasuo, his parent splash should be displaying. Looking into this now.~ 

*Edited to reflect proper info after redfeenix corrected me. :3 *
Shouldnt he be using the High Noon skin in this splash? Not 100% sure though
